name: Helicopter Sim 3D Mission
description:
Helicopter Sim 3D Mission!!!
A challenging helicopter simulator it maybe not as hardcore as another flight simulators but still one of the most fun helicopter games to play. Choose one of the challenging missions take a sit in the cockpit and become a real life helicopter pilot and start to test your skills.
FEATURES
Real world environments in a accurately city
Real fight game experience
Real helicopter controls
Real 3D fight game graphics
Real user friendly interface
